Title: The Platform
Writer: David Desola (screenplay by), Pedro Rivero (screenplay by), David Desola (story by)
Actors: Ivan Massagu√©, Zorion Eguileor, Antonia San Juan, Emilio Buale
Plot: A vertical prison with one cell per level. Two people per cell. Only one food platform and two minutes per day to feed. An endless nightmare trapped in The Hole.
